import React, { Fragment,useState,useEffect } from 'react'; import { Row, Col, Card, CardHeader, CardFooter, Media } from 'reactstrap'; import axios from 'axios' import {Follower,Following,TotalPost} from '../../../../../../../../constant' const FriendsTab = () => { const [ cards, setCards ] = useState([]) useEffect(() => { },[]) return ( {cards.map((cardItem, i) =>

{cardItem.name}

{cardItem.post}
{Follower}

{cardItem.follower}

{Following}

{cardItem.following}K

{TotalPost}

{cardItem.totalPost}M

 )} ); }; export default FriendsTab;
